attributes.action: A official inquiry into parliaments refusal to accept the democratic result
attributes.additional_details:
Members of parliament whose constituents voted to leave in the referendum have continually ignored the electorate. They are elected to represent the people who elected them and implement the instruction their constituents give them . Time and time again they’ve ignored the will of the people. 
They’re not serving the British people in a fair manner and a inquiry into this would help the country understand why
attributes.background: Parliaments continued delay in implementing the biggest referendum result in British history
